info.title: BC Route Planner REST API
info.description:
Finds shortest/fastest route between two points on British Columbia's public road network. Here are some geocoded addresses to play with: 
 18 Douglas St,Victoria -123.369628,48.408923 
  1002 Johnson St, Victoria -123.355745,48.426206 
 543 Johnson St, Victoria, BC -123.369077,48.42770 
 14 Centennial Sq, Victoria, BC -123.365645,48.428632 
 1105 Royal Ave,New Westminster  -122.920091,49.200637 
 808 Jackson Cres, New Westminster -122.907620,49.225588 
 10810 McDonald Rd, Chilliwack -121.938087,49.198594 
 3950 June Springs Rd, Kelowna -119.407515,49.839604 
 1201 Riondel Rd, Kootenay Bay -116.854024,49.744483 
 1201 Riondel Rd, Kootenay Bay -116.832759,49.730500 (parcelPoint) 
 2499 Walbran Pl, Courtenay -124.972951,49.715181 
 2013 Smoke Bluff Rd, Squamish   -123.139464,49.704015 
 235 Kelvin Grove Way, Lions Bay -123.235246,49.450354

get.description: Computes the length of the shortest path between given start and end points.

parameters.name: outputFormat
parameters.description: Output format (e.g., json, kml, html). Default is json.

parameters.name: points
parameters.description: Example: -123.707942,48.778691,-123.537850,48.382005. A list of any number of route points in start to end order. Points are specified as X1,Y1,...Xn,Yn where X and Y are values in the projection specified by the 'outputSRS' parameter. If no outputSRS is given, X is treated as longitude and Y is treated as latitude.

parameters.name: outputSRS
parameters.description: The spatial reference system (SRS) to use for output geometries. The default value is 4326 (WGS84, latitude/longitude).  Other common options are: 4269 (NAD83, latitude/longitude), 3005 (NAD83, BC Albers), 26907 (NAD83, UTM Zone 7N), 26908 (NAD83, UTM Zone 8N), 26909 (NAD83, UTM Zone 9N), 26910 (NAD83, UTM Zone 10N), 26911 (NAD83, UTM Zone 11N)

parameters.name: criteria
parameters.description: Routing criteria to optimize (e.g., shortest, fastest). Default is shortest.

parameters.name: distanceUnit
parameters.description: distance unit of measure (e.g., km, mi). Default is km.

parameters.name: routeDescription
parameters.description: Route description (e.g., Shortest route from 1002 Johnson St, Victoria to 1105 Royal Ave,New Westminster)

200.description: Distance of shortest or fastest route
